examples.example: 他这个人实在是太好了，总是热心地帮助别人。

translate.english: He is really so nice and always helps others enthusiastically.

examples.example: 这里的风景实在是太美了，让人陶醉其中。

translate.english: The scenery here is really so beautiful that people are intoxicated by it.

examples.example: 这次的活动举办得实在是太成功了，大家都非常开心。

translate.english: This activity was really held too successfully, and everyone was very happy.
